preconditions.precondition: Member wants to share an artwork

mainSequence.step: UI Manager shows the File Share Form
Member fills in content name, content type, and selects file
Application displays the file analysis result to Member
Application requests confirmation for the submission
Application copies the file to the "To moderate" directory
Application transmits the transaction and file to the Server
Server notifies the Librarian of the submission
Application notifies the Member of the waiting time for moderation
